amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to provide assistance to a State, or political subdivision of a State, that has in effect any law, policy, or procedure in contravention of immigration laws.

action.text: Mr. Fattah raised a point of order against the Collins (GA) amendment (A062). Mr. Fattah stated that the amendment seeks to change existing law and constitutes legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A062) offered by Mr. Collins (GA).
